title: How to Make a Guy's Heart Melt over Text

steps.title: Send a simple, sweet message to your crush.
steps.content: Send a simple, sweet message to your crush. If you just started spending time with a guy, you likely want to text him something cute and flirty (without giving away all of your feelings). Telling him that he brings a smile to your face will do just that. "You make me so happy." "You always know how to make me laugh."

steps.title: A good morning text is a great way to show that you care.
steps.content: A good morning text is a great way to show that you care. It's a sweet message to send to a guy you recently started seeing, and he'll love waking up to it. [1] X Research source "Hey you! Hope you've had a great morning so far." "You've been on my mind all morning. üòò" "I saw this and it reminded me of you!" [2] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 5 November 2019.

steps.title: Let him know that you're excited to see him soon.
steps.content: Let him know that you're excited to see him soon. You're likely both looking forward to date night, so why not let him know? It'll make him count down the minutes until he gets to see you, too. [3] X Research source "So excited to meet up later." "Looking forward to seeing you. ü•∞"

steps.title: Give him a sweet compliment to warm his heart.
steps.content: Give him a sweet compliment to warm his heart. Everyone likes to be flattered, and this guy is no exception. Hearing how cute you think he is will likely make him super happy. [4] X Research source "You're such a babe." "I can't believe I landed such a cute guy."

steps.title: Let him know if you're really falling for him.
steps.content: Let him know if you're really falling for him. If you're super into the guy you've been seeing, this is a sincere way to tell him. He'll love knowing that you're thinking of him. [5] X Research source "Been thinking about you nonstop!" "Still thinking about our date last night."

steps.title: If your man is out of town, tell him how much you miss him.
steps.content: If your man is out of town, tell him how much you miss him. Whether he's on a trip or he lives far away, letting him know that you're longing for him is a sweet way to show that you care. He likely misses you as well and will be relieved to know that he's on your mind despite the distance. [6] X Research source "Can't wait to see you again!" "Counting down the days until we're reunited." Reader Poll: We asked 563 wikiHow readers, and 64% agreed that the gesture they think would make their long-distance boyfriend feel the most special is sending him sweet messages . [Take Poll]

steps.title: Send a more intimate text if you're comfortable.
steps.content: Send a more intimate text if you're comfortable. He'll love knowing that you crave his affection, and he'll likely try to make plans to see you as soon as possible! [7] X Research source "Thinking about your kisses. üòò" "Can't wait for everything we're going to do together tonight. üòè" You might consider sending over a cute selfie, too.

steps.title: Tell your man how perfect he is for you.
steps.content: Tell your man how perfect he is for you. If you've been seeing your guy for a while now, your compliments can be a little more bold and sincere. Telling him how dreamy he is will reveal your genuine feelings, and it'll bring a smile to his face. "You're the perfect man for me. üòä" "You're a dream come true, babe."

steps.title: Express just how much you adore him.
steps.content: Express just how much you adore him. If you've been together through life's ups and downs, let him know how much you cherish his presence. He'll likely be happy to know how much he means to you. "You mean the world to me." "You're all I think about."

steps.title: Remind him how thankful you are to be dating him.
steps.content: Remind him how thankful you are to be dating him. Especially if you've been dating a long time, it's important to let your guy know how much you value your relationship. A random text like this will likely make his day. [8] X Research source "I couldn't be more thankful that we met." "You're one in a million. So happy to have you."

steps.title: Let him know you're still super into him if you've been together forever.
steps.content: Let him know you're still super into him if you've been together forever. If you're married or have been dating for years, it's important to remind your guy know how much you adore him. He'll love hearing that you still have a huge crush on him. "I have a huge crush on you, even after all of this time." "I fall in love with you more every day."

steps.title: Reminisce about the early days of your relationship.
steps.content: Reminisce about the early days of your relationship. This message is perfect if you've been together for a long time. Knowing that you still think of the beginning of your relationship will make him smile. Throw in a few details about your first date (or your first kiss) to really show him how much you care. "I still think about our first date all of the time. Can't believe it's been 5 years already.‚ù§Ô∏è" "Giving you my number was the best decision I ever made."

steps.title: Tell your guy that he's irreplaceable.
steps.content: Tell your guy that he's irreplaceable. Even if you've been together for years, your man will love a message like this. He'll appreciate knowing that he holds such a significant place in your life (and your heart). "You make life so much better." "You're the love of my life."

steps.title: A simple "I love you" text shows your man how much you care.
steps.content: A simple "I love you" text shows your man how much you care. Even if he knows you love him, share your feelings anyway. He'll love getting an encouraging message like this, and it'll likely warm his heart to know how much you love him (especially if you've been together for a long time).
